## 2. Fit a multiple linear regression mo del using the lm() function and store the result in an object called `lm.1`

```{r}
y<-stackloss[,4]
x1<-stackloss[,1]
x2<-stackloss[,2]
x3<-stackloss[,3]
lm.1<-lm(y~x1 + x2 + x3)

s.1 <- summary(lm.1)
s.1
```
